definitions.definition: A very wise person or spiritual teacher ; someone of gravity and wisdom , especially, a teacher venerable for years, and of sound judgment and prudence ; a grave or stoic philosopher .

main_definition: A very wise person or spiritual teacher ; someone of gravity and wisdom , especially, a teacher venerable for years, and of sound judgment and prudence ; a grave or stoic philosopher .

definitions.definition: The plant Salvia officinalis and savory spice produced from it; also planted for ornamental purposes.
Any plant in the genus Salvia .
Any of a number of plants such as sagebrush considered to be similar to Salvia officinalis , mostly because they are small shrubs and have gray foliage or are aromatic .

main_definition: The plant Salvia officinalis and savory spice produced from it; also planted for ornamental purposes.
secondary_definitions: Any plant in the genus Salvia .
Any of a number of plants such as sagebrush considered to be similar to Salvia officinalis , mostly because they are small shrubs and have gray foliage or are aromatic .
